5df75cf16b05c.Name: LLPG - MYSERVICES - address postcode lookup
5df75cf16b05c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59c0a03ddebc1","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) AS display, uprn AS name,
sao AS flat,
pao AS house,
street_name AS street,
town_name AS town , 
county_name AS county,
postcode,
uprn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
locality_name AS locality,
usrn
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

props.label: staticText 1
props.content:
Before you begin

This form is to be used to serve a Standard Temporary Event Notice. It must be served at least 10 working days prior to the event, not including date of event, date of service or Bank Holidays.

You are required to make payment with this form using a valid credit or debit card. After clicking the submit button at the end of this form, you will be taken to our secure online payment portal.

Cost of application: £{paymentCost}

Before completing this notice, please read the guidance notes (opens in new tab).

You should keep a copy of the completed notice for your records, this will be attached (PDF format) to your acknowledgement email which you will receive upon completion of this notice. By completing this notice, you will be notifying the Chief Officer of Police, the licensing authority and local authority exercising environmental health function at Brentwood Borough Council.

In the event that your premises straddles a local authority boundary, you will be required to provide a Temporary Event Notice to the licensing authority, environmental health function and Chief Officers of Police for both areas.

props.label: staticText 10
props.content: 3. Licensable Activities

props.maximumChoicesMessage: Please select no more than _max_value_ choices
props.label: Please state the licensable activities that you intend to carry on at the premises

listOfValues.label: The sale by retail of alcohol
listOfValues.value: The sale by retail of alcohol

listOfValues.label: The supply of alcohol by or on behalf of a club to, or to the order of, a member of the club
listOfValues.value: The supply of alcohol by or on behalf of a club to, or to the order of, a member of the club

listOfValues.label: The provision of late night refreshment
listOfValues.value: The provision of late night refreshment

props.label: Are you giving a late temporary event notice?
Please state the dates on which you intend to use these premises for licensable activities.
props.helpText: The maximum period for using premises for licensable activities under the authority of a temporary event notice is 168 hours (7 days).
props.maximumLengthMessage: Please input no more than _max_value_ characters
props.validationMaskMessage: Please input text of the format: _validation_mask_

props.validationMaskMessage: Please input text of the format: _validation_mask_

props.label: Please state the maximum number of people at any one time that you intend to allow to be present at the premises during the times when you intend to carry on licenseable activities, including any staff, organisers or performers.
props.maximumValueMessage: You can enter a maximum of 499

props.label: If the licensable activities will include the supply of alcohol, please state whether the supplies will be for consumption on or off the premises, or both.

props.label: staticText 24
props.content: Please note that your session may timeout without warning while completing this form. To ensure you do not lose your work please click the 'Save' button located at the bottom of each page to save your progress. If prompted, please ensure that you enter a valid email address. You will receive an email from noreply@brentwood.gov.uk containing a link to continue your form.

props.label: staticText 13
props.content: 5. Previous Temporary Event Notices

props.label: Have you previously given a temporary event notice in respect of any premises for events falling in the same calendar year as the event for which you are now giving this temporary event notice?
Please state the number of temporary event notices you have given for events in that same calendar year?
staticText 14
props.content: Have you already given a temporary event notice for the same premises in which the event period:

props.label: a) Ends 24 hours or less before; or
b) Begins 24 hours or less after the event period proposed in this notice?
staticText 15
props.content: 6. Associate and Business Colleagues

props.label: Has any associate of yours given a temporary event notice for an event in the same calendar year as the event for which you are now giving a temporary event notice?
Please state the total number of temporary event notices your associate(s) have given for events in the same calendar year
staticText 14
props.content: Have you already given a temporary event notice for the same premises in which the event period:

props.label: a) Ends 24 hours or less before; or
b) Begins 24 hours or less after the event period proposed in this notice?

Has any person with whom you are in business carrying on licensable activities given a temporary event notice for an event in the same calendar year as the event for which you are now giving a temporary event notice?
Please state the total number of temporary event notices your business colleague(s) have given for events in the same calendar year
staticText 14
props.content: Have you already given a temporary event notice for the same premises in which the event period:

props.label: a) Ends 24 hours or less before; or
b) Begins 24 hours or less after the event period proposed in this notice?
staticText 16
props.content: 7. Condition

props.label: staticText 17
props.content: It is a condition of this temporary event notice that where the relevant licensable activities described in Section 3 include the supply of alcohol that all such supplies are made by or under the authority of the premises user.

props.label: staticText 18
props.content: 8. Declaration

props.label: staticText 19
props.content:
The information contained in this form is correct to the best of my knowledge and belief.

I UNDERSTAND THAT IT IS AN OFFENCE:

(i) to knowingly or recklessly make a false statement in connection with this temporary event notice and that a person is liable on conviction for such an offence to a fine up to level 5 on the standard scaleÍ¾ and

(ii) to permit an unauthorised licensable activity to be carried on at any place and that a person is liable on conviction for any such offence to a fine not exceeding £20,000 or to imprisonment for a term not exceeding six months, or to both.

props.maximumChoicesMessage: Please select no more than _max_value_ choices
props.label: declaration
Full name
props.maximumLengthMessage: Please input no more than _max_value_ characters
props.validationMaskMessage: Please input text of the format: _validation_mask_

props.label: Date
props.minimumValueMessage: Please input a date no earlier than _min_value_
props.maximumValueMessage: Please input a date no later than _max_value_
props.dateFormatMessage: Please input a date in the format _date_format_

props.label: staticText 20
props.content:
9. Payment

There is a standard, non-refundable fee of £21.00 for every Temporary Event Notice.

If you wish to continue, please click "Submit". You will be redirected to a secure payment page where you can enter your payment details.

National Fraud Initiative

The Council is under a duty to protect the public funds it administers and may use or share the information it holds about you for the prevention and detection of fraud, and to aid the administration of other Council services. It may also share this information with other bodies responsible for auditing or administering public funds for these purposes. For further information, see www.brentwood.gov.uk/nfi (opens in new tab).
